Name: Trajectory Fracture
About the game: Looking to let off some steam? Look no further! Trajectory Fracture features a variety of tools like a bow, gun, bat and many others to break items in virtual reality! In the game you'll be met with a puzzle level that you'll be solving utilizing the very unique bouncing feature of the arrows shot from the bow Also you will be challenged to break a bunch of items under time constraints Features: Physics based items and interaction 8 Tools to break the items with Movement speed & snap turn options to aid with comfort A huge variety of breakable items Puzzle challenge level Find all the items challenge level Destroy all of the items in a limited amount of time level
Meta Title: Trajectory Fracture: Dec 25, 2020, Icepick and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Trajectory Fracture? Check out the release date (Dec 25, 2020), developer insights from Icepick, and a complete game summary.
